meanings.sent1: The puppy's docility made training a breeze.
meanings.sent2: The docility of the child allowed the teacher to guide them easily.
meanings.sent3: The docility of the robot made it the perfect assistant in the lab.
meanings.sent4: Her docility in following instructions was like a well-tuned machine.
meanings.sent5: The docility of the clouds as they drifted across the sky was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: Willingness to be taught or led
meanings.sent1: His docility in learning new skills impressed his mentor.
meanings.sent2: The docility of the students made the classroom a harmonious place.
meanings.sent3: The docility of the cat in wearing a tiny hat brought smiles to everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her docility in following the dance instructor's steps was graceful.
meanings.sent5: The docility of the river as it followed its course was a lesson in obedience.
